description: This file contains utility functions for processing uploaded media files (images, audio, video, documents) and generating identifiers, used within a FastAPI application.

methods.name: process_image
methods.description: Reads the content of an uploaded image file and returns an Image object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_audio
methods.description: Reads the content of an uploaded audio file, determines its format, and returns an Audio object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_video
methods.description: Reads the content of an uploaded video file and returns a Video object; raises HTTPException if the file is empty.

methods.name: process_document
methods.description: Reads the content of an uploaded document file and returns a FileMedia object; logs an error and returns None if an exception occurs.

methods.name: generate_id
methods.description: Generates a normalized identifier string from an optional name, or a UUID if no name is provided.
